mapper.select: select stc_case.CaseId, stc_case.UserId, stc_case.Model, stc_case.SceneId, stc_case.Scene, stc_scene.Scene_host, stc_scene.Scene_api, stc_case.CaseDescription, stc_case.CheckPoint, stc_case.TemplateId, stc_case.TemplateName, stc_template.TemplateDetail, stc_case.ExtraInputList, stc_case.DefautCheckType, stc_template.Input2SqlMap, stc_template.Sql2MongoMap, stc_template.Output2SqlMap, stc_template.Output2MongoMap, stc_case.ExtraCheckList from stc_case left join stc_scene on stc_case.SceneId=stc_scene.SceneId left join stc_template on stc_case.TemplateId=stc_template.TemplateId where stc_case.CaseId=#{caseId}
